name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
February 22: Lesson 4 - Photo story (my apartment)
March 8: Lesson 4 - Rooms, definite articles, adjectives
March 15: Lesson 4 - Furniture, colors, high numbers
March 22: Lesson 4 - Making dialogs, listening and reading exercises
March 29: Lesson 4 - Review, test
April 12: Lesson 5 - Photo story (my day)
April 19: Lesson 5 - Giving the time, activities at home
April 26: Lesson 5 - My schedule from Monday to Friday
May 3: Lesson 5 - Time of the day, opening hours, one day in Berlin
May 10: Lesson 5 - Review, test
May 17: Lesson 6 - Photo story (freetime)
May 24: Lesson 6 - Talking about the weather
May 31: Lesson 6 - Introducing new grammar: Akkusativ
June 7: Lesson 6 - Positive answer on negative questions, freetime
June 14: Lesson 6 - Review weather, weekend activities, test
June 21: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
